> <OLD>
>
> "Dont remain here!!"Replied perceptor while he took the human and ran
> towards the exit"I would hate to break the news to... you-know-who if
> something happens to you"

<NEW>

RODIMUS smiled grimly at PERCEPTOR, "I'm right behind you, now move!"

He turned around and fired at a few of the figures that popped up
trying to fire.

---------------------------------------------

Meanwhile  RAT TRAP stood on the on the other side of the secondary
tunnel standing at the old cage that had held NIGHTSHIFT there was
another that had been dug around it.  RAT TRAP could make out the
sound of laser fire coming from that hole, someone was in the middle
of battle!

Dimly he could the voice of RODIMUS could be heard giving orders, but
it was difficult to make out what. However he could definitely see the
flashes coming from it! It looked like RODIMUS and probably PERCEPTOR
were under attack.

The hole was easily twice as big as RAT TRAP should he choose to go
through the hole. He is Alomst small enough to slide through the bars
of the cage, but it would hurt a little and he might loose a bit of
fur.

OOC: Keep in mind there were two tunnels dug by Perceptor. One was to
get into the outer cave that held the mine shaft. Once you entered the
mine shaft itself there was a tunnel. In the middle of that a cage had
opened up to catch Nighshift a while back. Perceptor also dug a second
tunnel around that one as well.

Rat Trap is at the opening of that second tunnel at the cage. On the
other side of the cage and around the corner he can see the lights and
sounds of some sort of firefight.

> <OLD>
>
> There was a hiss from DINOBOT, "Acknowledged.  Predacons, mobilize."  He
> went to fly through the air, probably flanked by the rest of the TERRORCONS
> as they went to secure a perimeter!

> <OLD>
>
> DINOBOT hissed, "REmain quiet for now.  There is no sense in drawing out
> half the Maximal army to swarm over us.  Remain in Beast Mode.  If the
> Maximals assault, then deal wtih them.  Separate them into groups and
> isolate them."
>

Meanwhile outside the cave opening DINOBOT and the TERRORCONS were
arriving, their IFF signatures cut down to nearly nothing. They were
stalking forward and hiding.

Then the sound of TUCSON's roar echoed over the landscape!

HUN-GRR looked around as they other TERRORCONS were obviously startled
but kept it together.

"That was Tucson." CUTTHROAT said almost eagerly. "Is he nearby?" he
said in gravely tones.

RIPPERSNAPPER sniffed the air, "No, but I would imagine he is at the
Ark from the sound of it."

HUN-GRR nodded, "You just don't go out there running half cocked
unless I give the order, clear?"

CUTTHROAT grumbled something.

"I said clear!?!" HUN-GRR said more forcefully.

"Clear." CUTTHROAT said reluctantly.

 SINNERTWIST was standing next to DINOBOT, his attention on some
movement, "There are Maimals about.' he said pointing at UPROAR moving
off int he direction of the ARK.

BLOT nodded, "He came from there." He pointed with his clawed hand at
a tunnel opening. It loooked to have been recently excavated. He
turned to scratch his ear sending noxious smelling oils falling from
beneath where is armpits would be.

(TAG)

- Preston
